name: CPNavigationAlert
desc: An alert that displays map- or navigation-related information to the user.

items.name: init(titleVariants: [String], subtitleVariants: [String]?, image: UIImage?, primaryAction: CPAlertAction, secondaryAction: CPAlertAction?, duration: TimeInterval)
var image: UIImage?
items.desc: An image displayed in the navigation alert.

items.name: var imageSet: CPImageSet?
items.desc: An image set displayed in the navigation alert.

items.name: var primaryAction: CPAlertAction
items.desc: The primary action, and button, for the navigation alert.

items.name: var secondaryAction: CPAlertAction?
items.desc: An optional secondary action, and button, for the navigation alert.

items.name: var duration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The amount of time, in seconds, that the alert is visible.

items.name: let CPNavigationAlertMinimumDuration: TimeInterval
items.desc: A constant that defines the minimum amount of time that an alert is visible.

items.name: enum CPNavigationAlert.DismissalContext
items.desc: A set of reasons for dismissing a navigation alert.
